reasoning: The Wiki article detail page renders completely empty with no module content visible, preventing access to revision management features. While no explicit error is displayed, the Wiki module is failing to render any content where it should.
evidence_summary: Screenshot 1 shows Wiki module in edit mode with placeholder slots. Screenshot 2 shows WIKI TEST page selected in navigation but content area is completely blank - no article content, no edit/history options, no module output at all where Wiki content should appear.
